events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and started the review process.
The candidate's application was categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords like software and developer found in the resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate and coordinate further steps.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, discussing the candidateâ€™s experience with software development and project contributions.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the next step, eager to participate in the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on 2024-05-05 to evaluate their coding and system design skills.
